content.about: Rochester Antique Appraisals provides professional antique appraisal services in the Rochester area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Robert A.
reviews.content: Rochester Antique Appraisals's knowledge of 19th century antique furniture made the appraisal process smooth and thorough.

reviews.author: David B.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: David M.
reviews.content: They took the time to explain the historical significance of my antique pieces and provided a thorough valuation process.

reviews.author: Elizabeth M.
reviews.content: Their knowledge of antique furniture values was exceptional. The documentation they provided was detailed and perfect for my insurance needs.

content.about: Heritage Valuations Rochester provides professional antique appraisal services in the Rochester area with expertise in antique furniture, collectibles, fine art, and estate items. We offer thorough, accurate valuations for insurance, estate planning, charitable donations, and more.
content.notes: Serving the greater metropolitan area with professional antique appraisal services.

reviews.author: Susan C.
reviews.content: Very responsive and easy to work with. Their expertise with my antique pocket watch collection was impressive.

reviews.author: Robert B.
reviews.content: Extremely professional and knowledgeable about antique valuation. The appraisal was thorough and delivered on time.

reviews.author: James R.
reviews.content: Excellent service from start to finish. I highly recommend Heritage Valuations Rochester for any antique appraisal needs.
